doctor.name: Dr. Mohammad Nazmul Islam
doctor.workplace: Sylhet MAG Osmani Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Mohammad Nazmul Islam is a Hematologist in Sylhet. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Hematology), BSMMU. He is a Consultant, Hepatology at Sylhet MAG Osmani Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Mount Adora Hospital, Akhalia, Sylhet. Practicing hour of Dr. Mohammad Nazmul Islam at Mount Adora Hospital, Akhalia, Sylhet is 3pm to 5pm (Sun, Tue & Thursday) & 5pm to 8pm (Sat, Mon & Wednesday).

chamber.visitingTime: 3pm to 5pm (Sun, Tue & Thursday) & 5pm to 8pm (Sat, Mon & Wednesday)

doctor.name: Dr. Abu Yousuf Md. Nazim Uddin
doctor.specialty: Blood Diseases, Blood Cancer & Hematology Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Abu Yousuf Md. Nazim Uddin is a Hematologist in Sylhet. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Hematology), CCD (Diabetology). He is a Registrar, Hepatology at North East Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at North East Medical College & Hospital. Practicing hour of Dr. Abu Yousuf Md. Nazim Uddin at North East Medical College & Hospital is 10am to 1.30pm (Closed: Friday).
